projects.name: Fingerprint scanner
projects.description: Real fingerprint collection application that will only work when a supported accessory is detected by the application. The app works with connected by USB or Bluetooth devices. This Application allows you to scan high quality fingerprint images and store them for various purposes. Available options are: Email, FTP, and Save to File.
highlights: The application was written without having a physical device
